comments.body: do you mean create a function for this?  Or what scalatest function are you referring to?  This is the way I see other unit tests doing this for Windows.
I don't know what happens if user tries to run the test on Windows. Does it fail or silently skip? I don't have a Windows machine to verify. But if other tests are doing this, we might just follow.

I don't have a windows box to run on either so followed the existing tests and from my understanding it cancels the test so if you are looking a the test output it should show up under the cancelled section (rather then failed or succeeded)
